Dialogue.Page: Mod: Voice Acting Mod Author: Krevace, JohnCorby, and Friends
Voice Acting Mod is a mod that dubs the entirety of Outer Wilds's dialogue. Every single line seen in the base game and DLC are now fully voiced.
Modders can also use this mod for their story mods by integrating it with New Horizons. If you are interested in how to use this with your mod, check out how New Horizons Examples does it.
